title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Jollof Rice
summary: A West African dish of rice cooked in a tomtato based sauce, served with fried ripe plantains and a protein of choice.

title: Nigerian Egg Sauce
summary: A saucy egg and tomato scramble often served with rice or fried or boiled yams, potatoes or plantains
